recommendations: Greg Roberts ‚ÄúAnders is a highly professional recruitment consultant. He met all my expectations when looking for a fresh start by understanding my current situation, researching the type of company I wanted to join in detail and responded proactively in a timely manner. Excellent service from Priority. I highly recommend using priority for your next corporate move.‚Äù

Dave Watson ‚ÄúDuring my career in Retail I've come across many Recruitment Angencies, most of whom fail to get anywhere near the very high service I've witnessed with Anders and his team. I've experienced Priority Recruitment from both sides, as a candidate and as a customer and felt a genuine warmth from the people you talk too. If you're looking for a Recruitment partner I would suggest you look no further than Anders and his team, a genuine guy full of integrity.‚Äù
